newsitem.title: USA: Saliva Diagnostic signs distribution pact. [CORRECTED 20:13 GMT]
newsitem.headline: Saliva Diagnostic signs distribution pact. [CORRECTED 20:13 GMT]

text.p: Saliva Diagnostic Systems Inc said Wednesday it has signed a sales and distribution agreement with APS Canada to sell its rapid diagnostic tests and patented test components in Canada and countries in the Middle East and Asia.

APS Canada is a corporate member of the APS Group of Companies, owners and operators of medical laboratories, and is a provider of diagnostic test products worldwide. APS also provides management services for healthcare facilities.

In the first year of the contract, APS expects to sell a minimum of 750,000 tests and by year five of the contract it expects to sell two million tests annually. (Company corrects from the first five years of the contract.)
Saliva Diagnostic develops and makes rapid diagnostic tests that detect HIV antibodies in serum, blood and saliva, and a rapid blood test for bacteria linked to peptic ulcers and gastric cancer.
